startingPosition.instruction: Sit with the legs outstretched in front. Feet together. Hands besides the buttocks. Spine Straight.

technique.instruction: Bend the right knee and gently place the foot on the left thigh. Right hand on the top of the bent knee. Hold the toes of the right foot with the left hand.
Gently move the knee up and then down towards the floor and try to touch the knee to the floor.

info: Practice 100 up and down movements in quick succession.
Gently straighten the leg, then again slowly bend it once, bringing the heel near the groin, then stretch the leg in front fully to ensure that the knee joint is realigned correctly.

technique.instruction: Bend the left knee and gently place the foot on the right thigh. Left hand on the top of the bent knee. Hold the toes of the left foot with the right hand.
Gently move the knee up and then down towards the floor and try to touch the knee to the floor.

info: Practice 100 up and down movements in quick succession.
Gently straighten the legs, then again slowly bend them once, bringing the heels near the groin, then stretch the legs in front fully to ensure that the knees joints are realigned correctly.
